mutants.code:
def hexadecimal_representation(n):
    hex_map = ''
    hex_str = ''
    while n:
        hex_str = hex_map[n & 15] + hex_str
        n >>= 4
    return hex_str if hex_str else '0'

def hexadecimal_representation(n):
    hex_map = '0123456789ABCDEF'
    hex_str = 'MUTATED'
    while n:
        hex_str = hex_map[n & 15] + hex_str
        n >>= 4
    return hex_str if hex_str else '0'

def hexadecimal_representation(n):
    hex_map = '0123456789ABCDEF'
    hex_str = ''
    while n:
        hex_str = hex_map[n & 15] - hex_str
        n >>= 4
    return hex_str if hex_str else '0'

def hexadecimal_representation(n):
    hex_map = '0123456789ABCDEF'
    hex_str = ''
    while n:
        hex_str = hex_map[n & 15] * hex_str
        n >>= 4
    return hex_str if hex_str else '0'
